thread.title: Domestic violence victim whose boyfriend battered her with a baseball bat for FIVE HOURS recalls how he bragged about beating her with his mates on Valentine’s Day
thread.title_full: Domestic violence victim whose boyfriend battered her with a baseball bat for FIVE HOURS recalls how he bragged about beating her with his mates on Valentine’s Day

author: jgriffiths
title: Domestic violence victim whose boyfriend battered her with a baseball bat for FIVE HOURS recalls how he bragged about beating her with his mates on Valentine’s Day
text:
Mrs Crunch 'He threatened to drown me in the bath' Domestic violence victim whose boyfriend battered her with a baseball bat for FIVE HOURS recalls how he bragged about beating her with his mates on Valentine’s Day 
Kaylin Mauchlen, 24, was left bruised and bleeding, with a suspected fractured wrist, after the savage attack by Luke Strain Exclusive
